pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Emerge this package only within the crossdev context.
Required environment variables
EGODOT_MACOS_SYSROOT - The crossdev install of the macOS cross toolchain EGODOT_MACOS_SDK_VERSION - The macOS SDK version
These are to be defined in the per-package environment. Details to set this up can be found on:
https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki//etc/portage/package.env
See also:
https://github.com/tpoechtrager/osxcross/blob/master/build.sh#L32

use.flag: Compatibility for macOS SDK 10.5 or less
Compatibility for macOS SDK 10.6 or newer
